comments.body: One concern: this has the potential to become flaky if the image is updated. I'd prefer to freeze a particular version here, for the same reason that I like things like Maven and `pip --freeze`.
comments.diffHunk:

comments.body: +1, at least we should keep on the same version of the rdbms in question (as sometimes there are tweaks, enhancements on the docker image itself)
